items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I was looking for!
items.body: Liked this top a lot! I am 5`3 at 145lbs with a bra size 38C. Purchased a medium (viewed the size chart) in the darker pink color, it`s a pretty color and it fit good! Could have sized down to a small which it would have been more fitted, could have sized up to a Large but it would have been too baggy with lot`s of extra material so I purchased the Medium. Semi-oversized for that slouchy relaxed look, it`s comfy, and pretty soft. The material is thin so I would wear in in the fall or spring. I think for my apple size body type (size 10) which I`m a little thicker on top, it was flattering off one shoulder or on both! Would recommend this top to others. I also purchased two other colors! Read more
items.author: Jinah Joy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Girl buy it
items.body: So for reference I'm 5'7, weight fluctuates but generally between 143-150lb, I have massive 44in shoulders lol 30in waist, bust 38, hips 39. I'm a mama of 2 and I've been on a journey of remaking my wardrobe. Let me tell you I am SO friggin impressed with this I generally wear a medium in tops but I got a large in this. I definitely would have been ok with the medium but I was afraid of the off the shoulder not being off shoulder with the medium but I do believe it still would be with the medium . Although I sized up it's still a very flattering fit. It's not super thick, so It would definitely need to be layered up with something if you were looking for lots of warmth but I generally run hot so it's perfect for me, would definitely be good on those slightly chilly days or nights in the summer (depending where you live lol) so I think that makes it very versatile on wearing it different times of the year. It's so beautiful. I was shocked when I felt this top. I was not expecting how soft it was going to be when I think of waffle knit in think of a rougher texture but I am in love. The color I got I didn't notice any see through issue but I couldn't say for the other colors. I would be getting more of these in different colors if they were just a bit cheaper but man the quality is so good when I am in a position to get more I definitely will in more colors. Will update with photos soon Read more
items.author: Sophia

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cozy, Stylish, and Great for Layering
items.body: This sweater is a lovely addition to any casual wardrobe. The soft waffle-knit fabric is comfortable and breathable, making it perfect for layering in cooler weather without feeling too bulky. The V-neck and bell sleeves add a feminine, stylish touch that elevates the overall look compared to basic pullovers. I ordered the XL, and the fit is loose and relaxed, just as expected, though it‚Äôs worth noting that the bell sleeves can feel a bit roomy if you prefer a more fitted look. The color is true to the photos, which is rich and flattering for multiple skin tones. What sets this sweater apart from other casual knits is how effortlessly it balances comfort with style. It works well for both everyday wear and slightly dressier occasions when paired with leggings or jeans. Overall, the Tobrief Waffle Knit Sweater is cozy, versatile, and stylish, making it a reliable choice for a casual, comfortable look. Read more
items.author: Michelle Kim

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute but not as described
items.body: I love the color and neckline but in the product description it says oversized and it is definitely not oversized on me I‚Äôm 5‚Äô4 130lb and ordered a small it‚Äôs also slightly see through in the light but not bad I will be returning but reordering in a bigger size Read more
items.author: Lauren Olszewski

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super comfortable
items.body: I love this waffle top! The material isn't itchy it rough is smooth and so comfortable. It's true to size I wear a medium and it still fits loose like I pictured it to fit me it also my favorite color, same color as pictured üòç Read more
items.author: Emori Parsons

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sweater
items.body: Comfortable, soft and good oversized option. Soft and breathable material. Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Decent quality shirt, but shady customer service
items.body: The sweatshirt itself is okay, the quality is not very good and its a little bit itchy. The customer service is not good. I had to return the item as it was the wrong size and I bought the proper size. They claimed I didn't return the product, thus causing me to get charged again, making me pay for two sweatshirts, even though one was returned to them. Pretty shady. Read more
items.author: A

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Off Shoulder Long Sleeve V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Off Shoulder Long Sleeve V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: A-light Grey, B-blue, B-yellow, B-pea Green, B-caramel, A-white, A-dark Green, A-black, A-khaki, B-rose Red, A-dark Gray, A-navy Blue, B-light Blue, B-purple. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
